publicationVenue.name: International Journal of Engineering and Advanced Technology

title: Blended Learning Effectiveness in Higher Education
abstract: Blended learning is one of the most evolving teaching learning pedagogy. Educational institutions across disciplines are adopting the blended learning environment.. The new generation of students also known as millennials are digital natives. They are tech competent and prefer to use of technology in all areas. So it is very natural for teaching learning to be more technology oriented. But it is still essential to identify the willingness of the students to adopt the digital transformation in teaching learning.. Blended learning brings in the advantages of both traditional class room teaching and online or virtual learning. The current study tries tounderstand students’ willingness for a blended learning model approach and also tries to finds the effectiveness of blended learning model.
venue: International Journal of Engineering and Advanced Technology

citations.title: Analysis of Factors Affecting Students and Effectiveness of Online Lectures Through a System Approach
